slogan-1: 新加坡领先的餐饮解决方案供应商

benefit-title: 你需要的一切都在这里
benefit-1-description: 蔬菜/水果/调味料和干货/馒头/冷冻食品/饮料
benefit-2-description: 我们有一些新鲜的加工产品
benefit-3-description: 产品以最佳温度储存在仓库中
business-description: 24/7 全天候运作，用于订购、包装、交付和客户服务。
business-1-description: 在手机上选择您需要的一切，并随时提交订单。任何地方。
business-2-description: 我们在安全的环境温度下包装您的产品以保持新鲜。
business-3-description: 我们在包装后 1 ~ 8 小时内交付您的订单。
business-4-description: 随时随地在手机上查看您的费用和账单，并使用银行转账/转账、Paynow、支票等方式付款。
partner-1-description: 作为值得信赖的合作伙伴，我们服务于海底捞火锅、莆田、温家宝、A厨房等1000多家餐饮企业。自
partner-3-description: 发布以来，EBUY一直致力于提升客户体验和您的业务效率。
location-1-description: Ebuy主要在新加坡和马来西亚提供线上线下服务，我们在中国也有办事处。

evaluation-1-customer-company: Hai Di Lao Dining Pte. Ltd
evaluation-1-customer-text: The meat is fresh and just right. Surveyor carefully read the remarks, the work is in place.
evaluation-2-customer-text: Quickly put the little brother service in place, I fill in the wrong address, the little brother phone contact soon to me. Thank you very much!
evaluation-3-customer-text: So night, brother hard, fast delivery. Thank you
evaluation-4-customer-text: This apple is better than Aksu in New Zealand! Crispy and sweet! The ugliest apple I've ever seen and the best apple I've ever eaten
